timeline.message: Embed all exporters into agent jar
Publish agent with exporters and without

timeline.bodyText: oh, nice, I didn't realize there was a default port for OTLP
timeline.author: trask

timeline.bodyText: this seems a little fragile, and we only have smoke tests for the logging exporter at this point, maybe add a comment to each of the SpanExporterFactory classes about this dependency on their names?
timeline.author: trask

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I didn't like it neither. But I could not come up with any other way to identify implementations of SpanExporterFactory.
replies.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: Maybe it makes sense to open an issue in otel-java to add some id/name method to SpanExporterFactory?
replies.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: Yes, I like that, I forgot that SpanExporterFactory is basically just for auto-instrumentation anyways, so no reason not to add stuff in there that we need 👍
replies.author: trask

replies.bodyText: Then I will leave this as it is now for now and open an issue in otel-java. After that is done, will update this condition here in a future PR.
replies.author: iNikem

timeline.author: trask
trask

replies.bodyText: What is the plan for metric exporters and their configuration? If I want to send spans to Zipkin and metrics to Prometheus, how should I configure my agent?
replies.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: Good question. Can you open an issue to track this?
replies.author: trask
